mapper.select: SELECT area , sum(datediff(second, start_time, end_time)) as total_time , count(distinct machine_no) as run_count FROM [MDIoT].[dbo].[tb_mold_program_detail] a left join tb_mold_machine_area_config b on a.machine_no = b.machine_name where start_time between #{startTime} and DATEADD(dd, 1, #{startTime}) and end_time is not null and area is not null group by area

SELECT CAST(CAST (((sum(datediff(second, start_time, end_time))*1.0/(count(distinct machine_no) * 24 * 60 * 60)) * 100) as decimal(10,2)) as varchar(50)) as oee FROM [MDIoT].[dbo].[tb_mold_program_detail] a left join tb_mold_machine_area_config b on a.machine_no = b.machine_name where start_time between #{startTime} and DATEADD(dd, 1, #{startTime}) and end_time is not null and area = #{type}

select top 1 a.machine_no, c.area as program_name, (sum(datediff(minute, start_time, end_time)) over (partition by 1)) as totalTime from tb_mold_program_detail a join tb_mold_machine_area_config c on a.machine_no = c.machine_name where a.mat_tool_code = #{toolCode} order by a.id desc

select a.machine_no, a.monitor_no, a.program_name, start_time, end_time, DATEDIFF(SECOND, start_time, end_time) as totalTime from tb_mold_program_detail a join tb_mold_program_sheet b on a.monitor_no = b.monitor_no and a.program_name = b.program_name and a.mat_tool_code = b.mat_tool_code where b.mat_tool_code = #{toolCode} union all select a.machine_no, a.monitor_no, a.program_name, start_time, end_time, DATEDIFF(SECOND, start_time, end_time) as totalTime from tb_mold_program_detail a join tb_mold_program_sheet_history b on a.monitor_no = b.monitor_no and a.program_name = b.program_name and a.mat_tool_code = b.mat_tool_code where b.mat_tool_code = #{toolCode}
